Publications

Journal articles

Vermeent, S., Young, E.S., DeJoseph, M.L., Schubert, A.L., & Frankenhuis, W.E. (accepted pending data analysis). Cognitive deficits and enhancements in youth from adverse conditions: An integrative assessment using Drift Diffusion Modeling in the ABCD study. Developmental Science.

Vermeent, S., Spaltman, M., van Elswijk, G., Miller, J.B., & Schmand, B.A. (2021). Philips IntelliSpace Cognition digital test battery: Equivalence and measurement invariance compared to traditional analog test versions. The Clinical Neuropsychologist.


Vermeent, S., Dotsch, R., Schmand, B., Klaming, L., Miller, J.B., & van Elswijk, G. (2020). Evidence of validity for a newly developed digital cognitive test battery. Frontiers in Psychology: Neuropsychology.


Keesman, M., Papies, E.K., Vermeent, S., Aarts, H., & Häfner, M. (2016). Consumption simulations induce salivation to food cues. PLoS ONE.
